title: We lead the world
brief_description: The high incidence of tractor accidents in New Zealand and the safety precautions necessary with tractors. Proper handling of clutch and differential steering; need for guards on moving parts; keeping children away from tractors; need to know the country and take particular care on sloping ground; danger of driving a tractor with nobody near to help in case of accident.
